targets.rawSql: SELECT usage_date as time, SUM(cost_usd) as value FROM vw_cost_by_day WHERE usage_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT service, SUM(cost_usd) AS cost FROM vw_cost_by_day WHERE usage_date >= dateadd(day,-30,current_date) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10;
